meanings.definition: Pauraques: a type of nightjar bird
meanings.sent1: The pauraques chirped softly in the moonlit night.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pauraque perched on a tree branch.
meanings.sent3: The pauraques seemed to be having a late-night conversation.
meanings.sent4: The pauraques danced gracefully in the twilight sky.
meanings.sent5: The elusive pauraques blended perfectly with the dark surroundings.

meanings.sent1: The field guide mentioned that pauraques are commonly found in the region.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of pauraques flying together at dusk.
meanings.sent3: The pauraques looked like a flock of tiny shadows against the evening sky.
meanings.sent4: The pauraques scattered in all directions when startled.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful pauraques added a touch of mystery to the forest.
